text: Michelle Allen (née Michelle Harding) is a Canadian female curler. She was the alternate on the and Kelly Scott rink from 2005 to 2010. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !width="60"|Season!!Skip!!Third!!Second!!Lead!!Alternate Coach!!Events |- |
